variable_description: Census Tract ID from 2010 Census
Postal ZIP Code that the census tract falls within
California county that the census tract falls within

Approximate city where each census tract is located based on US Census Incorporated Places (2020, Cities), US Census Designated Places, (2020, Designated Places), and the CA Department of Tax and Fees City and County Boundaries and City Annexations (2021, Unincorporated Areas) boundary files. All tracts that did not fall within one of these boundaries were assigned "unincorporated county area" based on that tract's county. This is for reference purposes only and should not be used to determine whether a census tract falls within a city or town boundary.
